sentences.en: Be careful, Mom is in a snappy mood today.
sentences.cn: 小心, 妈今天的脾气不好.

sentences.en: Each film gets a snappy two-line summary.
sentences.cn: 每部影片都配有简洁明快的双行内容提要。

sentences.en: He wasn't irritable or snappy or anything, just slightly perplexed.
sentences.cn: 他并不是爱发火或爱起急什么的，他只是有点困惑。

sentences.en: Hey, that's a snappy new car!
sentences.cn: 嘿, 那辆新车真好看!

sentences.en: If you don't make It'snappy, we'll miss the train.
sentences.cn: 你再不赶紧, 我们就赶不上火车了.

sentences.en: into bed and make it snappy!.
Look at the pamphlets, and make it snappy.
Look snappy! The bus is coming.
sentences.cn: 快点儿! 公共汽车来了.

sentences.en: Make It'snappy. I can only stay a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 快, 我只能呆一会儿.

sentences.en: Pack your bags and make It'snappy; we leave in five minutes.
sentences.cn: 赶快把东西装进你们的包里, 5分钟后我们就走.

sentences.en: She was wearing a snappy little red number.
sentences.cn: 她身着一款时髦的红色衣服.

sentences.en: She's a very snappy dresser , ie She dresses very smartly and trendily.
She's always snappy early in the morning.
Why are you so snappy today?
sentences.cn: 你今天怎么这么没好声气?

sentences.en: You'll have to make It'snappy if you want to come too.
sentences.cn: 你也想来的话就得快点儿.

words.tran_cn: 咬；厉声说；咯嗒一声关上
突然折断，拉断；猛咬；啪地关上
厉声说话的；生气勃勃的；时髦的；爽快的

trans.tran_cn: 精力充沛的，敏捷的，漂亮的，时髦的，爽快的
trans.tran_en: If someone has a snappy style of speaking, they speak in a quick, clever, brief, and often funny way
